8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :the Messenger of Allah said: "When a half of Sha'ban remains then do not fast

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الصَّوْمِ فِي النِّصْفِ الثَّانِي مِنْ شَعْبَانَ لِحَالِ رَمَضَانَ .
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Fast During The Second Half Of Sha'ban For The Sake of Ramdan
